Package com.oracle.coherence.spring.configuration.annotation

Annotation Type CoherenceAsyncMap

  • @Target({FIELD,PARAMETER,ANNOTATION_TYPE})
@Retention(RUNTIME)
@Documented
@CoherenceCache
@Value("#{getAsyncCache}")
@Lazy
public @interface CoherenceAsyncMap
    Meta-annotation that marks the asynchronous wrapper implementation of Coherence Maps using AsyncNamedMap for dependency-injection.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Gunnar Hillert
    See Also:
    NamedCacheConfiguration

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element Description
      String name  
      String session  
      String value

          attribute="value")

        ""
